$
$
ABOUT ACT
/$
$
More Than 40 Years of Performances!
/$
$
$
Amelia Community Theatre has been staging artistic performances on Amelia Island since 1981. Today, we continue to believe our region’s volunteers, donors, and theatergoers greatly benefit from their involvements at our quality performing arts campus, where they participate in creating and watching live theatre and special events. ACT’s goal is to provide our audiences and volunteers an artistic and emotional experience they won’t forget. We invite you to read about our upcoming performances and buy your tickets today. See you soon!
/$
$
Upcoming Shows
/$
/$
$
ACT MISSION
/$
$
"To enhance the quality of life of our local (and extended) community by providing excellent, innovative theatrical and artistic experiences through presentation, participation, and education."

/$
$
by Agatha Christie
/$
$
Get to Know our 2025-2026 Season
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
What are the benefits of being a season member?
/$
$
Membership includes discounted season tickets and booking preferences. Use your season tickets individually, as a couple, or bring friends and family to one show! If you miss one of the six, season shows, simply use your extra ticket on the next one!
/$
$
What shows can I use my season tickets for?
/$
$
ACT's 44th
Season begins
, September 1st, 2024
, and closes on August 31, 2025.
Season tickets may only be used within a single season.
/$
$
Is there any fine print for season memberships?
/$
$
Of course! All memberships and tickets are non-refundable and subject to changes, governmental regulation, restrictions, and other uncertainties. All shows and productions may be subject to change, rescheduling, and cancellations. Memberships and season tickets may be used only for shows within ACT's 44th Main Stage Season. Attending live events may present dangers. Personal health is the sole responsibility of each individual attendee. ACT urges anyone attending a live event to be aware of any relevant concerns and regulations which might pertain to each person's health and well-being.
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
$
Can I buy more than one season membership?
/$
$
Absolutely! Purchasing two 10 Ticket Memberships will grant you 20 tickets to use. You can bring everyone to the theatre! Feel free to mix and match to get the number of tickets you want for the season.
/$
$
Am I guaranteed an
in-person seat?
/$
$
You must reserve your seat either online or through the box office, even as a season member. You may book your tickets before the season even starts!
/$
$
What about COVID?
/$
$
Personal health is the sole responsibility of each individual attendee. ACT urges anyone attending a live event to be aware of any relevant concerns and regulations which might pertain to each person's health and well-being. ACT adheres to current laws and recommendations for public health and safety. ACT follows all local, state, and federal regulations for seating, masks, cleaning, and social distancing.
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
